Inclusion criteria low stage bilateral progressive keratoconus , transparent cornea thin corneal thickness ≥ 440 µm . Using Cochet-Bonnet esthesiometer central corneal sensitivity measure preoperatively , 7 day , month surgery recovery baseline preoperative level . Normal level central corneal sensitivity consider 40mm .
